header.type: Document type (supported types: rechnung, gutschriftsanzeige, angebot,bestellung, proformarechnung, teilrechnung, korrigierte rechnung, konsolidierte rechnung, vorauszahlungsrechnung, invoice, credit note, offer, order, proforma invoice, partial invoice, corrected invoice, consolidated invoice, prepayment invoice)
header.currency: Currency code (e.g. EUR, USD, CHF, GBP)
recipient.name: Recipient name
recipient.countryCode: Country code e.g. DE, UK, US, CH, FR, SE
recipient.taxes[0].number: Tax number (this and next value are indexed, [0] in this case. It means that you can put multiple tax definitions)
recipient.taxes[1].number: Tax number for second tax definition
issuer.name: Issuer name
issuer.countryCode: Country code (e.g. DE, UK, US, CH, FR, SE)
items[0].name: First item name (this and following items[0].xxx values are indexed ones, you can define multiple items thanks to this)
items[1].name: Same as items[0].name
